attributes.action: The United Kingdom government should offer asylum to Asia Bibi and her family.
attributes.additional_details: See this article in the Telegraph: https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/11/11/asia-bibi-not-offered-uk-asylum-amid-concerns-unrest-attacks/
attributes.background: Asia Bibi, a former farm labourer in Pakistan, was arrested for blasphemy on the grounds that she is a Christian, not a Muslim. Despite Pakistan's highest court reversing her conviction, Asia has been the target of mob demands that she be executed. Her request for asylum in the UK has been declined.
